definitions.definition: A head of real or synthetic hair worn on the head to disguise baldness , for cultural or religious reasons, for fashion , or by actors to help them better resemble the character they are portraying .

main_definition: A head of real or synthetic hair worn on the head to disguise baldness , for cultural or religious reasons, for fashion , or by actors to help them better resemble the character they are portraying .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , among fishermen ) An old seal .
